question:
You are due to start a new job next week but you will not be able to because you have some problems.
Write a letter to your new employer. In your letter:

explain your situation
describe your problems
tell him/her when you think you can start
text: I am writing this letter  to  notify you that I will not be about to resume the Job on 27th August 2022 as early scheduled in my appointment letter due to  unforeseen circumstances beyond my control. Besides, the subsequent paragraphs will address the circumstances and furthermore seek for new resumption date.
Although, I have contacted a few agents to search for affordable housing around the vicinity of the organization. However, all the efforts have not been successful.

Moreover, the heavy vehicular traffic constantly experienced at the city gate where my current accommodation is situated will make to be getting late for work  , therefore I do not want to start the work on the wrong foot.
Subsequently, I will be glad if you can grant me two weeks extra to sort out the accommodation issue and also differ the resumption till 7th September 2022.
Hence, I will be hoping to hoping to read from you soon . Thanks for your anticipated cooperation
